Class Museum

  • java.lang.Object
    • attractions.Museum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttractionNode
    public class Museum
extends Object
implements AttractionNode
    The Museum class stores information of Museums and implements the attraction node interface for Dijkstra's

      • Museum

        public Museum​(String MuseumId,
              String MuseumName,
              String[] loc,
              double[] coords,
              double p,
              double rate,
              double reviewCount)
        The constructor sets the fields
        Parameters:
        MuseumId - the id
        MuseumName - the name of the stop
        loc - the address of the Museum in an array
        coords - the latitude/longitude coordinates
        p - the price associated with the stop
        rate - the five star rating
        reviewCount - number of reviews left at this establishment
